block.p: American League CLEVELAND INDIANS--Purchased the contract of LHP Chris Haney from Buffalo of the International League. Designated LHP Eric DuBose for assignment.
American League CLEVELAND INDIANS--Purchased the contract of LHP Chris Haney from Buffalo of the International League. Designated LHP Eric DuBose for assignment.
Northern League NL--Announced the Cleveland Indians have purchased the contracts of St. Paul RHP Hank Thoms and Sioux Falls RHP Julio Rivas.

National Football League CAROLINA PANTHERS--Signed T Al Lucas to the practice squad. Waived WR Darrel Daniel from the practice squad. CLEVELAND BROWNS--Placed WR JaJuan Dawson on injured reserve. Signed LB Doug Colman. PHILADELPHIA EAGLES--Signed S Je'Rod Cherry to a one-year contract. Released DE Tyrone Williams.
National Hockey League MONTREAL CANADIENS--Announced the retirement of RW Trent McCleary. Signed D Craig Rivet to a two-year contract.
East Coast Hockey League AUGUSTA LYNX--Agreed to terms with F Louis Dumont. CHARLOTTE CHECKERS--Signed F Martin Cerven and F Josh MacNevin.
United Hockey League FORT WAYNE KOMETS--Signed C Jeff Loder.
National Lacrosse League NLL--Named George Daniel deputy commissioner and general counsel.

SOUTHERN CONFERENCE--Named Bernadette McGlade Southern Conference coordinator of women's basketball officials. AKRON--Named Scott Demetral assistant baseball coach and Keith Closson women's assistant soccer coach. AUGUSTA STATE--Named Shannon Hanson women's golf coach. BELHAVEN--Named Kevin Griffin men's assistant basketball coach. CLEMSON--Named Rana Reider women's assistant track and field coach MARS HILL--Named women's basketball coach Laura Timmons senior women's administrator. MINNESOTA--Named John Romo assistant director of media relations. PACE--Named Daniel Caputo assistant athletic trainer. PENN STATE--Named Ron Roeder men's assistant gymnastics coach. SAINT LOUIS--Named Tony Breitbach trainer. THE CITADEL--Named Chris Cowart men's assistant basketball coach.
